data.title: before the show
data.text:
stopped in before the show at plymouth playhouse
like to come here for the deep dish pizza
service was good 
food was good
had a party of seven

data.title: Gone downhill
data.text:
Used to love this place  but it has lost its touch
Our server Becky was crabby and everyone stood around.
Food was borderline cold and drinks took forever..even though it was empty
Not coming back

data.title: Excellent meal prior to seeing a play at the Plymouth Playhouse
data.text: The Green Mill had a wonderful menu; something for everyone.....Prices are great and nice variety of foods for everyone!!!

owner_response.author: Millie G, General Manager at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks, Winnie! We appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review. Come back and join us again soon for more delicious food!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: L O N E L Y
data.text: It was late and quiet except for a few drinkers huddled at the bar. Cheese curds were my company as I waited out a rain-delayed ballgame for my Bacon Burger. The staff smiled knowing I was out of place. This is why they build a restaurant at a cheap hotel- for lonely guys like me.

owner_response.author: Millie G, General Manager at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for the review! We're happy to hear you came to visit us. We hope you enjoyed your burger and cheese curds. Next time you're in town, please visit us again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Staff is there biggest asset
data.text: They offer a free pizza buffet, and noticed it was not restocked quickly enough for those patrons choosing to indulge.  It was cold.  Server, Levi, was great.  He knows the value of true customer service.

owner_response.author: Millie G, General Manager at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks, Anna, for the review. We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us and we're happy to hear you enjoyed our service. Come back and join us again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Delicious lunch before Plymouth Playhouse play
data.text:
We arrived early for our noon lunch reservations to a nearly empty restaurant.  This surprised me since previous visits to this Green Mill shortly before a play production found the place extremely busy.  (We later learned that this particular matinee was far from sold out.)  

Our server was very cordial and attentive.  The food was delicious and prices acceptable.

owner_response.author: Millie G, General Manager at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for the great review! We appreciate the kind words and we're happy to hear you enjoyed our food and overall experience during your visit! Come back and join us again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Always a great place to eat
data.text: We have eaten at this restaurant several times, and have always had great food and good service. We will be back again and again!

owner_response.author: Millie G, General Manager at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for the kind words! We're happy to hear you had a great experience and look forward to having you back in!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Yum
data.text: One cant go wrong with some good Desert Fire Pasta.  It has been a while since I've been to Green Mill and it was good.  The chicken was a little too done though.  The other food at the table looked just as good.  Service was excellent and she was right on top of things!

owner_response.author: Millie G, General Manager at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for taking the time to share your review with us. We're happy to hear that you enjoy our Desert Fire Pasta, however, we're sorry to hear about the outcome of your chicken. Please contact us at info@greenmill.com so we can follow-up with you. Thank you!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good food and service, thanks Luke
data.text: Stopped in for dinner, I asked what do people order the most, what is the Green Mill known for? The answer the pizza, not the best I have ever had but good, special mention for the hand made crust very tasty, good amount of meat too. Thanks for good servive Luke!

owner_response.author: Millie G, General Manager at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for taking the time to let us know about your recent experience with us. We're pleased to hear you enjoyed our service and that you tried out our pizza! We'd love to serve you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Happy hour free pizza!
data.text: While the menu is "typical" bar food you cannot go wrong with free happy hour pizza until 6PM.  I am a wine drinker and their selections are not to my liking. My husband on the other hand is happy with a Surley furious.

owner_response.author: Millie G, General Manager at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. Could you please email us your contact information so we can follow-up with you? Thanks!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good Happy Hour
data.text: Went for a co-workers final day...they have pizzas out for happy hour which was perfect.  Not sure on what days and times but worth checking out.

owner_response.author: Millie G, General Manager at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks for the great review! We appreciate the kind words and we're thrilled to hear you enjoyed our pizza during happy hour! We hope to have you back in soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great seating and service but food is uneven
data.text: We like the seating at this restaurant.  Tables and booths are roomy and relatively private.  Service is pleasant and prompt.  Food however was mixed.  The steak wasn't done to order, there were bones in the walleye, and the pasta was good.  It was a good place for two couples to meet and talk.

owner_response.author: Millie G, General Manager at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you, Leigh, for taking the time to leave us a review! We are thrilled you enjoy our service and atmosphere, however, we're sad to hear your food wasn't cooked to order. Please contact us at info@greenmill.com so we can follow-up. Thanks!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: The only good part was our food
data.text: My husband and I went to Green Mill last night. Our server, Becky K, started us off on a bad note. We were sitting outside on the patio. It was a beautiful night and we were the only people outside. We were greeted in a mostly efficient manner, but our server did not introduce herself or ask how our night was going. She first says, "What can I get you to drink?" I don't think that's a friendly greeting at all. Granted, we didn't come out last night seeking to have stellar service, but when we dine out it's usually a pleasant experience, and the server is a huge part of that. We noticed on the menu they had the fun pop machine where you can choose your soda and syrup. I asked if Diet Caffeine Free Coke was available, our server said yes, so I ordered one with cherry syrup, as well as a water. She returned shortly with my husband's drink, and a pink drink for me. There was no Coke of any kind in my glass, and we determined that it was just straight cherry syrup. I did not receive a water. She took our order and left, and I eventually decided to go up to the host stand to get a new beverage. A different server, Nicole, told me that they did not carry Diet Caffeine Free Coke and so I instead just asked for the water that I did not receive, and for Nicole to please make sure I wasn't charged for the soda. I went up to the host stand again about 10 minutes later, as we were not brought or offered refills by our server. I kindly asked the host for refills. She was friendly enough and helped me out by telling me where the restroom was. I thought the cleanliness of the restroom was very poor for a restaurant. The floors were dirty and sticky, and a soap dispenser and a paper towel dispenser were empty. Nicole is the one who brought us a caddy of supplies, checked on us during our meal, and ended up taking care of our payment. The food was excellent, although the fry portion with my burger was quite small. I'm in the hospitality industry myself and I understand sometimes you get super busy, but the restaurant was relatively slow. I also understand how we might have been an inconvenience by being the only people dining outside, but a guest should never be made to feel that they are a nuisance to the server or restaurant. The food was great tasting and I thank Nicole for being helpful to us even though it was still Becky's name on our receipts at the end of our meal, so I can only assume Becky never transferred us to Nicole. What really rubbed us the wrong way was the unfriendliness of the server, the fact that we always had to be the ones to initiate our refills, and the fact that she lied about Diet Caffeine Free Coke. I can understand not being sure, but I would appreciate honesty or a simple "Let me check for you." I'm sure we seemed like a super needy and annoying table, but it is only because we were receiving extremely poor service.

owner_response.author: Millie G, General Manager at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you, Erin, for taking the time to leave us a review. We are sorry to hear about your recent experience with us. Please contact us at info@greenmill.com so we can follow-up. Thanks!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: convenient, good pizza
data.text: Was there late in the evening.  I had the combo pizza and it was very good.  After 9pm the large size was 1/2 price, so was a good deal .

owner_response.author: Millie G, Guest Relations Manager at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hi 418dnl, Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review.I am glad to hear you enjoyed our pizza! We look forward to serving you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Late, light supper
data.text: I enjoyed a chicken Thai bowl of soup and my daughter had a turkey wrap late on Saturday evening.  Both were good quality for the price and tasty.

owner_response.author: Millie G, Guest Relations Manager at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Dinina48MN,

Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. I am glad to hear you enjoyed our Chicken Thai Soup! We look forward to serving you and your daughter again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Dirty + Mediocre Service + Ok Food
data.text: The whole facility looked old and tired. Food on the carpet and on our booth. Dirty silverware. Men's bathroom wasn't any better. This location seems to be attached to a hotel, and it looks like it gets a LOT of foot traffic. Our server was fine - not impolite, but not exceptional either. Moderately attentive. The food tasted decent, but the lack of cleanliness everywhere weighed on my mind - I didn't want to think about what the kitchen looked like.

owner_response.author: Millie G, Guest Relations Manager at Green Mill, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Jdawgm13, 
Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. I am sorry to hear about your experience visiting our Green Mill location. I would like the opportunity to make this right, do you mind sending us an email at info@greenmill.com?
Thank you for your feedback.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Ok
data.text: Went here out of convenience as I was staying in the hotel. Food was decent but extremely over priced. A bowl of pasta and a beer shouldn't cost close to $30 in a family style restaurant. If you are making the noodles from scratch and mixing up a fancy cocktail that would be different. Service was was standard, some 30 year old that didn't want to be there. Could've would've should've found an Applebee's.

data.title: Average food, great servise
data.text: The food in the restaurant is average. It is immitating the Italian cusine. Really, this is an Americn restaurant with large portions and rather heavy food. I must say ...a great service and very friendly staff.

data.title: Dependable lunch delivery
data.text: My workmates have had good luck when ordering from this nearby restaurant to our office.  We can specify a time and they arrive promptly. The food is always done the way we ordered it.

data.title: Uptowner Cosmo
data.text: Love the Uptowner Cosmo. Always enjoy their pizzas and turkey bacon wrap. Great family restaurant. Went to a wedding catered by them and just loved the food.
